TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content: Mike...i think it looks like its time to record. Thank you!

> 
> Meanwhile, on my side of things:

I've not yet had a reentry not look like this. Though usually the nose ends up pointed straight down instead of up... Just using parachutes instead now

Awesome Mike! 

Though it looks like that the Orbiter Attaching mounts could need some edge split and smoothing, and it looks like that in the inside of the engines (as seen from the back) is a normal issues, you can see the sky through the engines. Maybe you fixed that already, I haven't tried your version yet. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Awesome Mike! 
> Though it looks like that the Orbiter Attaching mounts could need some edge split and smoothing, and it looks like that in the inside of the engines (as seen from the back) is a normal issues, you can see the sky through the engines. Maybe you fixed that already, I haven't tried your version yet. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

going flat out today lol.

anyone wanting the gantry please note you will need kerbal constructs (I think its called) and its not textured yet.

as for the shuttle lifting capacity I can make a more powerfull booster variant if needed. will just need a cfg file to download.
can I do a little texturing for the Gantry? well for my self then show you it

Aw...finally home! Time to start..BEFORE I get caught up in talking to my new gf, Xannari, and/or World of Warships!

standard shuttle setup booster increases:

TWR 2.15 to 2.65

Delta v 1830 m/s to 2105 m/s

time 1m08s to 1m06s

![rY3Mk6Y.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/rY3Mk6Y.jpg)

file here: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/gnq7xdinclr34pj/MediumD2.cfg?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gnq7xdinclr34pj/MediumD2.cfg?dl=0)

place in gamedata/space\_shuttle/parts/boosterpack folder.

you will now have a new heavy lifting booster (and still have the normal one)
